name: Let there be Chaos (AcheGames)
description:
Explore the Cemetery, and find a way to make chaos.

W,A,S,D keys for movement.

ALT key pressed to run.

J   Key to interact with objects 

K   Key to hit with the hammer

Mouse left click for the message panels

Don't let the enemies touch the player and don't let the enemies leave the cemetery.

Destroy all enemies to finish the chaos.

If you have any issues playing on the browser,  I suggest you to download the compressed file.
